overview: Eyal Inbar is a General Manager of Marketing at Unify². He is responsible for defining the strategy, and overall GTM for Unify2 worldwide. Prior to joining Unify², Eyal was General Manager Applications Portfolio at NEC America and prior to that that he was General Manager Marketing and product management at Active Voice, a wholly own subsidiary of NEC Corp. Before joining Active Voice, Eyal worked for Microsoft where his responsibilities included developing global marketing strategies, and managing a marketing team in the Microsoft Unified Communications group. Eyal graduated from Tel Aviv University in 1997.
